description: Mumbai street food context shot with closed or empty stalls, utensils and signboards visible, representing everyday urban food culture.
Indoor shot of takeaway food containers placed on a table near a window, showing a calm, everyday eating scenario.
Close-up of uncovered food kept at a stall counter, highlighting hygiene concerns in a realistic way.
Clean indoor kitchen counter with freshly prepared food and neatly arranged vegetables, representing a hygienic alternative.
Organized indoor cafe or restaurant food display area with clean surfaces, reinforcing conscious food choices.
Minimal indoor dining table with fresh fruits and water near a window, creating a calm, healthy closing visual.
